modName: Kels' Immersive Simple Small Mod Emporium -KISS ME-
summary: A place to get small minor things changed, colored, moved, re-sized, added or whatever. Open to any small request!
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][/size][u][size=5]Welcome to:[/size]
[/u][/center][size=6]
[b][color=#ff0000] [center]Kels' Immersive Simple Small Mod Emporium -KISS ME-[/center][/color][/b][/size]

[size=3]I have opened a place for requests to provide small and simple mods for everyone. Did you ever want something tiny done that you've never seen? Request it here.[/size]

[color=#00ff00]So far offering (Will attempt any request!)[/color]
[list]
[*][size=2]Things removed or added.[/size]
[*][size=2]Things re-sized.[/size]
[*][size=2]Objects swapped for other objects[/size]
[*][size=2]Renaming of People, Places or things.[/size]
[*][size=2]You think of it and I can likely do it.[/size]
[*][size=2]A Dawnbreaker at Helgen? Sure why the heck not.[/size]
[*][size=2]Rabbits to have 5,000hp and Alduin to have 50hp? OK![/size]
[/list]
[size=6]List of requests done so far:
[/size][quote][b][u][color=#ffff00]Quaranir has a life[/color][/u][/b]
[b]
Requested by - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1091065/?]Mookeylama[/url]

[/b][b][i]By default the Psijic [/i][/b][color=#efefef]Quaranir can also be found after meeting with the Dragonborn at the College. He resides at [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/The_Frozen_Hearth]The Frozen Hearth[/url], though he does not engage in conversation and cannot be [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Pickpocket]pickpocketed[/url]. Upon a pickpocket attempt, he acts as if dialogue was initiated and speaks his lines.
[/color]
[b][i]Now he:[/i][/b]
[color=#efefef]When he is done talking to you he will go the the Candleharth Hall in Windhelm to watch and see if the college screws more stuff up. He now has a full basic AI package, he'll eat, sleep, drink use the fireplace and interact. He also has rich citizen loot on him so pickpocketing him is a thing now. [/color][/quote][quote][color=#f4cccc][size=3][b][u]Falions Secret[/u][/b][/size][/color]

Requested by - [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/4916384-lued123/]lued123[/url]

[color=#ffffff]Falion is hiding filled Black Soul Gems in the pot by the fire.[/color][/quote][quote][size=3][color=#a64d79][b][u]Drop That Hip![/u][/b][/color]
[/size]
[color=#ffffff]Requested by -[/color] [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/11089453-faramentha/]Faramenthia[/url]

[color=#ffffff]Makes Palegius Hip Bone Drop-able.[/color][/quote][quote][color=#e69138][size=3][u][b]All Merchants Have 10,000 gold [/b][/u][/size][/color]

[color=#ffffff]Requested by -[/color] [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/7132477-angelusgaming/]AngeLusGaming[/url]

[color=#ffffff]All Merchants now have 10,000 Septims as their base amount.[/color][/quote][quote][color=#00ffff][size=3][b][u][/u][/b][/size][/color][b][u][size=3]No More Clairvoyance[/size][/u][/b]

[size=2][color=#ffffff]Requested by - [/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/17469844/?]DeatMetalHHH[/url]

[color=#ffffff]This one removes all traces of Clairvoyance. Books, effects all of it GONE![/color][/size][/quote][quote][size=3][color=#ff00ff][b][u]Clear Path to The Jarl's[/u][u]*
[/u][/b][/color][/size][color=#ffffff][size=2]Removes the fire pits from the path to the Jarls[/size][/color]
&
[color=#8e7cc3][size=3][b][u]1 Handed Rune Hammer**[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff]Simply a 1 Handed version of the Rune Hammer.
Gunmar sells them and they are improve-able. There are two on the dining table in Fort Dawnguard also.[/color]

[color=#ffffff][size=2]As requested on the forum by - [/size][url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/33271665-maularukothebarbarian/][size=2]MaularukoTheBarbarian[/size]
[/url]
*[i]Changelog v.5a:[/i]
Removed the fire lights and added a little light to the rooms in other ways.
[i]Changelog v.5b:[/i]
Added Windhelm and removed the shadow effect lights for a more subdued lighting in the longhouses.

**Changelog v.5a:
Added the missing mesh and missing spell effect.[/color][/quote][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8128936/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Kelsenellenelvians' Mods[/url] [/b][size=4]<---- Check my mods list![/size]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/1704/images/5993-0-1483499732.png[/img]
author: Kelsenellenelvian
